document.full_text: venezuelan president hugo chavez, who critics accuse of stifling press freedom, was given a prize by an argentine journalism school on tuesday for his contribution to "popular communication."
document.title: venezuela's chavez wins journalism school prize
lines_and_colors: venezuelan president hugo chavez, who critics accuse of stifling press freedom, was given a prize by an argentine journalism school on tuesday for his contribution to "popular communication."
